name: MYTHIC: The Story Of Gods And Men (Canceled)
blurb: An Action/Strategy based RPG brought to you by the team that left Blizzard to work on our own project!  By Gamers and For Gamers!

rewards.reward: An exclusive desktop WALLPAPER for your PC, Mac, tablet or mobile device, along with our heartfelt thanks. Choose with or without the logo. Be a part of the revolution! BONUS... will also receive an air high five from random member of our team! ;-)
A copy of MYTHIC, along with all the big upgrades we're planning to add to the multiplayer, distributed digitally on PC or Mac. Includes all previous rewards.

Get the GODS EPIC EDITION of Mythic. Get to Vote on the next class of GODS! The single player game as described above, plus the digital art book including production art and design sketches, the original soundtrack and desktop wallpaper. On top of all that, as a special thanks we'll include your name in the OFFICIAL CREDITS for the game. Official "MYTHIC" Shirt included as well!

Be a real part of MYTHIC! At this tier we'll provide you a template and you provide us with YOUR OWN GOD POWER SIGN DESIGN which we'll put into the actual game found on alter walls and pillars. Includes all previous rewards. $10 for shipping outside the US & Canada.

A limited edition print of the official game POSTER for MYTHIC in full movie poster size (24 x 36 inches), SIGNED by the team at Little Monster Productions. Look to the left to check out the art. Includes all previous rewards - please add $10 for shipping outside the US & Canada.

Your generous donation guarantees that you'll get not just the poster andT-SHIRT designed exclusively for the Kickstarter campaign (check the art to the left), but also score a nice laptop bag! Once it's over we won't be making any more! Includes all previous rewards - please add $15 for shipping outside the US & Canada.

Hard Copy of the official sound track done at the Disney Studios this fall!  Different from the official soundtrack, once the campaign ends these special edition CDs won't be available again. As part of the special music promotion, the donations we receive from this prize category go directly to help fund an all-out, full orchestral score for the game, recorded in a live studio! Includes all previous rewards.  please add $15 for shipping outside the US & Canada.

Don't just support MYTHIC, own a piece of art from it. This tier features a physical crest belt buckle from the game. Choose one of three main classes from the game. Includes all previous rewards - please add $15 for shipping outside the US & Canada.
Have your name as one of the NPCs in the game!  This is your chance to show off to all your friends and forever become known by becoming immortalized in MYTHIC! Includes all previous rewards.
Get a 12 inch tall character model for your desktop! Brought to you by the art of 3D printing. Includes all previous rewards - please add $20 for shipping outside the US & Canada.

Personalize the game! Send us a picture of something that you own and we will throw it into the game environment! Because this includes all previous rewards, please add $20 for shipping outside the US and Canada

Our team is extremely excited about this one. Get your own LIFE SIZED SWORD!!!,  These are real metal display swords modeled after one used in game!  Hang them on the wall above your work station or in your "Man Cave" Each sword will be numbered and signed by our team. Includes all previous rewards. No shipping cost needed for this tier.

BECOME A DEMI GOD in the actual game. We'll create a unique deity with your likeness and work with you on a great name and backstory for him or her. You'll appear in the game in various forms of effigy and be written into the lore, where all may see. Includes all previous rewards. Email us for more info.

We'll 3D model and animate you, personally, into the game doing an attack or using a special ability so you, too, can become a GOD. How many chances will you have to be animated into a 3D game using motion capture? Backers must be local or able to travel to the LA/Orange County area. Afterwards, let's get some lunch. Includes all previous rewards, do we even need to say it at this point? Email us for more info.

PRIZE OF THE GODS.... This gives you every prize we have to offer (except for the 3D personal motion capture animation), including Two different custom made swords that will be used in game (life size and the real thing!) . On top of that, you will be given a personal chance to sit with the Team and pick their brains on the gaming industry for an entire day in San Francisco (we fly you out and hole you up at the "W" hotel all expenses paid to come to next years GDC with us!).
